content.rendered:
Travel and fitness work together to create a happier, healthier you. Maximize your stay when you use these exclusive facilities. Personal training sessions available by appointment only.

It is a wonderful place to enjoy a peaceful meal after a full day of exploring nearby attractions.

  • Guests under the age of 15 are permitted with accompanying guardians.
  • Preschool children may use the pool without charge.
  • Children wearing diapers should not enter the pool. That also applies to waterproof diapers.In observance of appropriate decorum, kindly refrain from wearing bathrobes, swimwear or slippers anywhere in the public spaces.
  • Locker rooms are provided at the Pool for changing.
  • Bathrobes, towels and slippers are provided for your convenience at the Pool.
  • Housekeeping will be delighted to bring you complimentary usage training wear for your convenience in the Fitness Center or for jogging.

excerpt.rendered: Travel and fitness work together to create a happier, healthier you. Maximize your stay when you use these exclusive facilities. Personal training sessions available by appointment only.
